ships.name: U.S.S. Pasteur
ships.text: After you perform a maneuver with a speed of 5 or greater, you may immediately perform an [evade] Action as a free Action.

admirals.name: William T. Riker
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Place a [scan] Token beside your ship. You may then perform 1 Action from your Upgrade bar as a free Action. You cannot perform the [scan] Action as a free Action this round.

captains.name: William T. Riker
captains.text: ACTION: Place a [scan] Token beside your ship. You may then perform 1 Action from your Upgrade bar as a free Action. You cannot perform the [scan] Action as a free Action this round.

captains.name: Beverly Crusher
captains.text: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, each time you defend this round, you may convert 1 of your [battlestations] results into an [evade] result.

captains.name: Worf
captains.text: ACTION: Roll +1 attack die and +1 defense die this round. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

upgrades.name: Nell Chilton
upgrades.text: When defending, during the Deal Damage step, after your ship suffers at least 1 damage to its Hull, you may discard this card to immediately perform an additional Green Maneuver.

upgrades.name: Alyssa Ogawa
upgrades.text: ACTION: Remove 1 Disabled Upgrade Token from 1 of your [tech] or [crew] Upgrades and then perform a [scan] or [evade] Action as a free Action.

upgrades.name: Impulse Drive
upgrades.text: During the Activation Phase, if you reveal a 1, 2 or 3 Maneuver (Straight or Bank), before you move you may disable this card. If you do so, and the maneuver is a white maneuver, treat it as a green maneuver. If the maneuver is a red maneuver, treat it as a white maneuver.

upgrades.name: Inverse Tachyon Pulse
upgrades.text:
When you initiate an attack while there is a [scan] token beside your ship, you may disable this card. If you do so, the defending shiph rolls -1 defense die against that attack.

No ship may be equipped with more than 1 Inverse Tachyon Pulse Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Yellow Alert
upgrades.text: At the start of the Combat Phase, before any attacks are made, you may discard this card. If you do so, place either 1 [evade] or 1 [battlestations] Token beside your ship (even if there is already one there).

upgrades.name: Starfleet Intelligence
upgrades.text:
When defending, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may discard this card to re-roll any number of your defense dice.
OR
When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may discard this card to re-roll any number of your attack dice.
